title: vaDivElan aDi
sahitya:
vaDivElan aDi pOTri vandiDu manamE nI


anupallavi

  aDiyAraik-kaDait-tETra aNuvAvi malai vITru paDi mIdil avar paDum pADanaittum pOkkum


caraNam    innal aDuttennai mEnmEl iDai viDAdu tunbappaDutta nI tuDittu ayarum pOdu
enna shaiduivadu enrrEngiDum pOdu inbam aLikka valla vanna mayil vaLLalAna
